applicant.name: Large Volume Imports Ltd.
applicant.address: Industrial Plot 25, DEPZ, Savar, Dhaka-1340, Bangladesh

beneficiary.name: Bulk Manufacturing Corporation
beneficiary.address: Manufacturing Hub, Industrial Area, Coimbatore-641021, India

issuing_bank.name: Islami Bank Bangladesh Limited
issuing_bank.address: Head Office, 40 Dilkusha C/A, Dhaka-1000, Bangladesh

description_of_goods: 100% Cotton Yarn, Count 20s/1, Ring Spun, Raw White, Cone Packing, HS Code: 5205.11.00
presentation_period: Documents must be presented within 21 days after each shipment date but not later than expiry date
partial_shipments: Allowed - minimum shipment 20,000 kg, maximum 4 shipments
required_documents: Commercial Invoice in triplicate showing partial shipment details
Full set of clean on board ocean Bills of Lading indicating partial shipment number
Detailed Packing List with shipment-wise breakdown
Certificate of Origin issued by Indian Chamber of Commerce
Quality Certificate from manufacturer confirming yarn specifications
Marine Insurance Certificate covering each shipment value plus 10%
special_instructions: Each partial shipment must be clearly marked as 'Shipment X of Y'
Invoice must show cumulative shipped quantity and remaining balance
Bills of Lading must reference this LC number and partial shipment clause
Insurance must be obtained for each individual shipment
Final shipment documents must indicate 'Final Shipment' clearly

partial_shipment_terms.shipment_schedule: At beneficiary's option within validity period
partial_shipment_terms.cumulative_tracking: Each shipment document must show total shipped and balance
partial_shipment_terms.final_shipment_marking: Last shipment must be marked 'Final Shipment'
partial_shipment_terms.tolerance_per_shipment: 5% quantity variance allowed per individual shipment

banking_instructions.partial_payments: Payment will be made for each complying partial presentation
banking_instructions.cumulative_limit: Total payments not to exceed LC amount plus tolerance
banking_instructions.document_requirement: Each partial shipment requires full document set
banking_instructions.final_shipment: Final documents must reconcile total quantity and amount

compliance_considerations.ucp600_article_31: Partial shipments explicitly allowed with proper documentation
compliance_considerations.document_consistency: Each partial shipment requires consistent document set
compliance_considerations.expiry_compliance: Each shipment must comply with LC expiry terms

key_validations: Document requirements for each shipment clear
Insurance arrangements for partial shipments defined
potential_warnings: Final shipment marking critical for closure
_test_expectations.test_purpose: Validate partial shipment compliance under UCP600 Article 31 and operational feasibility
